modName: Meshe pathes and Texturing in Skyrim tutorial guide
summary:
Mesh pathes and Texturing in Skyrim tutorial guide.
Covers mesh pathing for retextures and some basic info on textures, what you need to know to add a custom texture to game that is craftable
descriptionHtml:
Meshing & Texturing in Skyrim tutorial guide.

Covers mesh pathing for retextures and some basic info on textures, what you need to know to add a custom texture to game that is craftable.

 Links to good video on how to texture and remodel meshes.

part1
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4pVouHPiiSw
part2
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6UD3yCXMauw&feature=related
part 3 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c4cHDovJnI8&feature=related

Thx to skierymbob
